      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from class: SpringLooper
        The BaseSpringSystem has requested that the looper begins running this Runnable on every frame. The Runnable will continue running on every frame until SpringLooper.stop() is called. If an existing Runnable had been started on this looper, it will be cancelled.
        Specified by:
        start in class SpringLooper

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from class: SpringLooper
        The looper will no longer run the Runnable.
        Specified by:
        stop in class SpringLooper
